A post shared by Wedding Casa (@theweddingcasa) on Dec 20, 2018 at 7:42pm PST
title: From DeepVeer To Salman Khan, Here’s How B-Town Partied At Priyanka-Nick’s 3rd Reception
description: The celebrations are on! After Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas’ dreamy wedding in Udaipur’s Umaid Bhawan, Priyanka Chopra organised a wedding reception in Delhi which sought the presence of PM Narendra Modi. Last night, the couple threw a wedding bash for their friends and family in Mumbai, and today the couple is hosting the third reception for their friends from the industry.
